feed.title: The Three Houses AU Bang - Summaries

entry.title: Summary001
entry.summary: In the world of magical girls, Lysithea watches all of her friends die. To save them, she wishes to go back in time to when they first met - but still fails to save them. She tries over and over again, going back in time, and she won’t stop trying …
entry.content: In the world of magical girls, Lysithea watches all of her friends die. To save them, she wishes to go back in time to when they first met - but still fails to save them. She tries over and over again, going back in time, and she won’t stop trying until she succeeds.

entry.title: Summary002
entry.summary: A rival radio show fic, starring Linhardt and Marianne as people who vaguely know each other and are intrigued by the other's existence- she follows his instagram, while he never misses one of her shows. They play music from local bands most frequently on their shows- including Strike Force (the …
entry.content: A rival radio show fic, starring Linhardt and Marianne as people who vaguely know each other and are intrigued by the other's existence- she follows his instagram, while he never misses one of her shows. They play music from local bands most frequently on their shows- including Strike Force (the black eagles), Blue Lions, and Claude and the Golden Deer!

entry.title: Summary003
entry.content: Dimitri, Claude, and Edelgard are brand new Pokemon trainers, who go to see Professor Byleth for their first Pokemon. Dimitri chooses Squirtle, Claude chooses Bulbasaur, and Edelgard chooses Charmander. They go their seperate ways, following each of them on differents steps to become the Pokemon League Champion.

entry.title: Summary004
entry.summary: Set in the mid-1920s in a unified Fodlan, all of the characters are involved in the silent picture film industry. Dimitri and Felix are stars who are fronting a production of a history film based on their ancestors, Loog and Kyphon. When Dorothea is injured before joining as the love …
entry.content: Set in the mid-1920s in a unified Fodlan, all of the characters are involved in the silent picture film industry. Dimitri and Felix are stars who are fronting a production of a history film based on their ancestors, Loog and Kyphon. When Dorothea is injured before joining as the love interest for Felix as Kyphon, Annette is tapped to take her place as a stand-in. When she more than delivers, everyone has to decide whether to risk the movie on the growing chemistry between a known leading man and a complete unknown.

entry.title: Summary005
entry.content: During their travels across Fódlan, Linhardt and Caspar find themselves in the most peculiar town at the worst possible moment, as a beloved member of the community is murdered. Linhardt is set on solving the mystery, much to the dismay of the knights placed on the case.

entry.title: Summary006
entry.summary: The members of the Golden Deer group, in order to pass a year-long business class, are expected to run a coffee shop and keep it afloat, catering to the students in the college town of Garreg Mach. Instead of following that one (simple) task, they instead find romances, friendships, and …
entry.content: The members of the Golden Deer group, in order to pass a year-long business class, are expected to run a coffee shop and keep it afloat, catering to the students in the college town of Garreg Mach. Instead of following that one (simple) task, they instead find romances, friendships, and the occasional temptation to ditch the class entirely.

entry.title: Summary007
entry.summary: Claude is a single father trying his absolute best to be a good and loving dad to his (mildly) spoiled daughter. Unfortunately, he is called into school one day to address a possible issue of his child (ALLEGEDLY) bullying her classmate. Fortunately, the father of said bully victim is Dimitri …
entry.content: Claude is a single father trying his absolute best to be a good and loving dad to his (mildly) spoiled daughter. Unfortunately, he is called into school one day to address a possible issue of his child (ALLEGEDLY) bullying her classmate. Fortunately, the father of said bully victim is Dimitri, an incredibly handsome (and maybe single?) man who is excited to try and work together to mend their children’s relationship.

entry.title: Summary008
entry.summary: Continuation of a Dragon Age AU, in which Ferdinand is a Templar and Hubert is a blood mage. After they were separated and forced to flee the Circle for their lives, Ferdinand and Hubert rediscover each other on the road and agree to travel together, all while Ferdinand deals with …
entry.content: Continuation of a Dragon Age AU, in which Ferdinand is a Templar and Hubert is a blood mage. After they were separated and forced to flee the Circle for their lives, Ferdinand and Hubert rediscover each other on the road and agree to travel together, all while Ferdinand deals with lyrium withdrawal and comes to terms with the fact that blood magic isn't as awful as it seems. Featuring lots of mutual pining. (And maybe they'll get to join the Inquisition and fight for mage rights and save the world and fall in love. You know how it goes.)

entry.title: Summary009
entry.summary: There’s no place Claude von Riegan would rather be during election year than in the city of New York. This immigration lawyer has had enough with establishment politics, and in an act of spontaneity, he decides to run for office as a progressive Democrat. Claude recruits the help of …
entry.content: There’s no place Claude von Riegan would rather be during election year than in the city of New York. This immigration lawyer has had enough with establishment politics, and in an act of spontaneity, he decides to run for office as a progressive Democrat. Claude recruits the help of critically-acclaimed campaign manager Dimitri Alexandre Blaiddyd to go up against some of the most powerful Democrats in Congress: the Gloucester family. Individuals from seemingly opposite worlds are brought together in what will be the most contentious election in New York’s history.

entry.title: Summary010
entry.content: Dimitri, Captain of the Areadbhar, meets Byleth, a whiskey maid during one of their layovers. The two fall in love and learn to navigate those feelings while Dimitri is at sea.

entry.title: Summary011
entry.summary: Dimitri is a college student who's been in love with video game enthusiast Glenn for the longest time. He starts playing the new virtual reality mmorpg in an attempt to impress Glenn and finally ask him out on a date. Ingrid, Felix, and Sylvain join his party for moral support …
entry.content: Dimitri is a college student who's been in love with video game enthusiast Glenn for the longest time. He starts playing the new virtual reality mmorpg in an attempt to impress Glenn and finally ask him out on a date. Ingrid, Felix, and Sylvain join his party for moral support; shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: Summary012
entry.content: Eight travellers, all with their own aims, set off across Orsterra to fulfil their goals. Their backgrounds seem incompatible, ranging from a prince of a lost kingdom who took up the dancing garb to a knight who failed to protect her liege, but their stories come to intertwine.

entry.title: Summary013
entry.summary: Dimitri is missing, and Felix is determined to look for him. All signs point to the wizard Byleth Eisner having some answers, but chasing after one demon invites the attention of another, and Rhea curses him old to slow him down. Undeterred, Felix catches up to Byleth's moving castle and …
entry.content: Dimitri is missing, and Felix is determined to look for him. All signs point to the wizard Byleth Eisner having some answers, but chasing after one demon invites the attention of another, and Rhea curses him old to slow him down. Undeterred, Felix catches up to Byleth's moving castle and makes a deal with her fire demon Sothis to break their contract in exchange for breaking his spell and helping him unravel what happened to the missing prince.

entry.title: Summary014
entry.summary: Edelgard's step-brother, Dimitri, is chosen as a sacred sacrifice, an offering to keep the Goddess pacified through song and dance for the rest of his life. Determined to save him from his fate at any cost, Edelgard sets off to slay the beast guarding the Goddess' Tower, a terrifying creature …
entry.content: Edelgard's step-brother, Dimitri, is chosen as a sacred sacrifice, an offering to keep the Goddess pacified through song and dance for the rest of his life. Determined to save him from his fate at any cost, Edelgard sets off to slay the beast guarding the Goddess' Tower, a terrifying creature known only as the Ashen Demon.

entry.title: Summary015
entry.summary: Claude von Riegan is the greatest pirate to sail the seven seas. As a notoriously successful smooth-talker and problem solver, he is tasked with finding a legendary treasure on a remote island that seems to shift latitude and longitude on its own. His contractual employer, Dimitri of the Holy Kingdom …
entry.content: Claude von Riegan is the greatest pirate to sail the seven seas. As a notoriously successful smooth-talker and problem solver, he is tasked with finding a legendary treasure on a remote island that seems to shift latitude and longitude on its own. His contractual employer, Dimitri of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus, tags along for the ride with his mage, Annette. Alongside Claude and his crew, they will hunt down this incredible bounty, fight sea-monsters, and maybe find love along the way.

entry.title: Summary016
entry.summary: Dimitri and Edelgard have been engaged since birth, and are set to marry soon after their eighteenth birthdays; but Edelgard has other plans. Dimitri's hopes for the future are shattered when his beloved fiance, Edelgard, betrays him and declares war on the Church of Seiros. As the years go by …
entry.content: Dimitri and Edelgard have been engaged since birth, and are set to marry soon after their eighteenth birthdays; but Edelgard has other plans. Dimitri's hopes for the future are shattered when his beloved fiance, Edelgard, betrays him and declares war on the Church of Seiros. As the years go by, Dimitri fights back against Edelgard and the Imperial Army, seeking answers from his former fiance, drowning in more and more madness and heartbreak along the way.

entry.title: Summary017
entry.summary: Claude envies Dimitri for how easy he has it, having his gender practically handed to him at birth and never having to fight for being seen as who he is. He doesn't know Dimitri is trans, too, and equally resents Claude for the exact same reasons. They project their bitterness …
entry.content: Claude envies Dimitri for how easy he has it, having his gender practically handed to him at birth and never having to fight for being seen as who he is. He doesn't know Dimitri is trans, too, and equally resents Claude for the exact same reasons. They project their bitterness onto the monthly inter-college debate competitions, not realising that underneath their rivalry, a lot of mutual pining and attraction awaits.

entry.title: Summary018
entry.content: Student Council Vice President Felix Fraldarius is known to be pretentious, snippy, and generally unfriendly. What they don’t know, is that Felix Fraldarius also happens to have the biggest crush on Varsity hockey player Dimitri.

entry.title: Summary019
entry.content: Three wanderers meet each other, and together decide to go to a new world where they could finally live in peace. As they get to know each other (and their past) they realise they're not so different after all.

entry.title: Summary020
entry.summary: Bernadetta moves to the city after cutting ties with her family in an attempt to pursue her artist dreams. Desperate for a place to live, she signs a too-good-to-be-true lease to room with a tall, red-headed stranger who's super rich and probably a serial killer (she's convinced!). Yet, instead of …
entry.content: Bernadetta moves to the city after cutting ties with her family in an attempt to pursue her artist dreams. Desperate for a place to live, she signs a too-good-to-be-true lease to room with a tall, red-headed stranger who's super rich and probably a serial killer (she's convinced!). Yet, instead of a murderer, Bernadetta finds Sylvain - the biggest idiot with an "unrequited" crush on his best friend - and accidentally becomes his friend and matchmaker.

entry.title: Summary021
entry.content: It's not everyday you wake up and find out that you and your boyfriend not only knew you each other in a past life, but that you hated him for causing your brother's death. Some things are better left in the past.

entry.title: Summary022
entry.content: Three ordinary people: Ignatz, Leonie and Raphael all signed up at private detective office, Byleth Eisner. Seeing that the three were worthy for the position, she offered them a test by solving a murder case of a police officer.

entry.title: Summary023
entry.summary: Caspar is a men's fitness model who becomes pretty popular after starring in a few, extremely masculine commercials for fast food and cologne. Linhardt is his flabby and lanky best friend who spends all his time in bed, even when doing his job as a programmer, but he's also been …
entry.content: Caspar is a men's fitness model who becomes pretty popular after starring in a few, extremely masculine commercials for fast food and cologne. Linhardt is his flabby and lanky best friend who spends all his time in bed, even when doing his job as a programmer, but he's also been head-over-heels in love with Caspar since he learned what love is. One day, a paparazzo catches them on an outing and mistakes Linhardt for Caspar's girlfriend and all hell breaks loose.

entry.title: Summary024
entry.summary: Byleth moves to a sleepy town across the continent without knowing why. She starts to remember parts of her past life and reconnect with the reincarnations of the people she knew. However, the love of her life is nowhere to be find - not in her memories or among the people …
entry.content: Byleth moves to a sleepy town across the continent without knowing why. She starts to remember parts of her past life and reconnect with the reincarnations of the people she knew. However, the love of her life is nowhere to be find - not in her memories or among the people around her.

entry.title: Summary025
entry.summary: Dimitri is the reincarnation of Dracula and is drawn to the castle to take up the mantle. Claude fails to save him, so he works for five years to become a monster hunter and learn more about Dracula so that he can summon the castle back into the world and …
entry.content: Dimitri is the reincarnation of Dracula and is drawn to the castle to take up the mantle. Claude fails to save him, so he works for five years to become a monster hunter and learn more about Dracula so that he can summon the castle back into the world and try again to save Dimitri.

entry.title: Summary026
entry.summary: When the gods go missing, it's up to Dimitri, Edelgard, and Claude to find them. They'll have to fight monsters, wrestle with their own demons, and uncover the secrets the gods have held for millennia if they hope for success. Only, the prophecy promises that one of them will die …
entry.content: When the gods go missing, it's up to Dimitri, Edelgard, and Claude to find them. They'll have to fight monsters, wrestle with their own demons, and uncover the secrets the gods have held for millennia if they hope for success. Only, the prophecy promises that one of them will die in the process...

entry.title: Summary027
entry.summary: Marrying Felix is easy - it means neither have to come out to parents who aren’t willing, and there’s worse people their parents could’ve arranged for each other. Neither go in expecting anything, but when Sylvain catches feelings, “easy” quickly becomes something he’s got no clue how …
entry.content: Marrying Felix is easy - it means neither have to come out to parents who aren’t willing, and there’s worse people their parents could’ve arranged for each other. Neither go in expecting anything, but when Sylvain catches feelings, “easy” quickly becomes something he’s got no clue how to navigate. (or, Felix and Sylvain are the couple from that one viral Reddit post a while back about the marriage-of-convenience husbands ACTUALLY falling for one another)

entry.title: Summary028
entry.summary: werewolves are a known part of the population, but Dimitri in particular has difficult transformations -- as a wolf, he becomes aggressive, destructive to anything within reach. Dedue takes one look at his enclosure (an empty concrete basement) and goes WELL THERE'S YOUR PROBLEM. YOU NEED ENRICHMENT. lets get you some …
entry.content: werewolves are a known part of the population, but Dimitri in particular has difficult transformations -- as a wolf, he becomes aggressive, destructive to anything within reach. Dedue takes one look at his enclosure (an empty concrete basement) and goes WELL THERE'S YOUR PROBLEM. YOU NEED ENRICHMENT. lets get you some squeaky toys and six pounds of raw hamburger and see how you do

entry.title: Summary029
entry.content: In which Felix impulse buys a 'really cool looking' sword from a pawn shop -- but also it's cursed. Upon unsheathing said weapon, Felix is unfortunately forced into a binding contract with its blade. As luck would have it, his cute next-door neighbor might just have the solution.

entry.title: Summary030
entry.summary: Dimitri, once a pinnacle of justice, struggles to accept the betrayal of Edelgard five years later. A new league has formed between the Blue Lions and Golden Deer Superhero Task Forces. Will Dimitri succumb to the ghosts of his past, or will he be able to move on thanks to …
entry.content: Dimitri, once a pinnacle of justice, struggles to accept the betrayal of Edelgard five years later. A new league has formed between the Blue Lions and Golden Deer Superhero Task Forces. Will Dimitri succumb to the ghosts of his past, or will he be able to move on thanks to the guidance of a mentor he long believed was dead?

entry.title: Summary031
entry.content: A retelling of the Hades & Persephone myth with a twist. Featuring Byleth as Persephone, Yuri as Hades and Rhea as Demeter.

entry.title: Summary032
entry.summary: Leonie meets Sylvain and Felix when they come through the drive-thru at her work. They get to know each other, and Leonie learns that a) Sylvain isn't actually a dumbass, b) Felix isn't cool, not even a little bit, and c) it's okay to relax sometimes and not burn yourself …
entry.content: Leonie meets Sylvain and Felix when they come through the drive-thru at her work. They get to know each other, and Leonie learns that a) Sylvain isn't actually a dumbass, b) Felix isn't cool, not even a little bit, and c) it's okay to relax sometimes and not burn yourself out!

entry.title: Summary033
entry.content: The wicked Edelgard has been released from her dumpster on the moon. Now, Lady Rhea must summon five teenagers with attitude and protect Garreg Mach from her wicked magic. For lack of better term, it's morphin' time.

entry.title: Summary034
entry.summary: Everything changed when Dimitri’s father married his stepmother, Patricia, then died, leaving them behind to grieve and pick up the pieces of their fledgling estate. While reduced to a common servant instead of a cherished son and brother, Dimitri does his best to have courage and be kind despite …
entry.content: Everything changed when Dimitri’s father married his stepmother, Patricia, then died, leaving them behind to grieve and pick up the pieces of their fledgling estate. While reduced to a common servant instead of a cherished son and brother, Dimitri does his best to have courage and be kind despite his stepfamily’s abuse. Yet magic still remains in the world — and when he meets the kingdom’s princess in the woods, Dimitri’s life will change forever.

entry.title: Summary035
entry.summary: Every area of the ocean is ruled by royal bloodlines possessing a Hero's Relic, and have been taken under control by Cornelia one by one. Sylvain and his pirate crew are finding these heirs before it is too late. In place of the Aegis Shield specifically is a merman on …
entry.content: Every area of the ocean is ruled by royal bloodlines possessing a Hero's Relic, and have been taken under control by Cornelia one by one. Sylvain and his pirate crew are finding these heirs before it is too late. In place of the Aegis Shield specifically is a merman on the brink of death, Felix, who later decides to join them to retrieve his Relic and missing brother alike.

entry.title: Summary036
entry.summary: Annette is a new member to the coven, but has more than proven her skill with magic; Mercedes is a longtime member and takes Annette under her wing. One day, the Necromancer causes trouble in the local area and threatens the coven’s safety. Annette and Mercedes must help defend …
entry.content: Annette is a new member to the coven, but has more than proven her skill with magic; Mercedes is a longtime member and takes Annette under her wing. One day, the Necromancer causes trouble in the local area and threatens the coven’s safety. Annette and Mercedes must help defend their coven, and defeat the Necromancer once and for all.

entry.title: Summary037
entry.content: The Blue Lions are a prevalent mob in Fodlan. Their leader Dimitri and his right hand man Dedue are kidnapped by TWSitD, rumors say that they're still alive. The Blue Lions team up with Claude and his Golden Deer in order to save Dimitri and Dedue.

entry.title: Summary038
entry.content: Sylvain and Bernadetta meet on a Naruto RP forum in 2007, become close, and fall out of touch. Years later Sylvain finds her art tumblr, Bernadetta finds his emo thirst trap tumblr, and they both find freedom in one another.

entry.title: Summary039
entry.summary: While visiting their father in the city of Garreg Mach, a series of strange events leads Byleth to befriend a mysterious girl named Sothis and a group of super-powered students calling themselves the Ashen Wolves. When tragedy strikes Byleth’s family, the six friends set out for revenge — along the …
entry.content: While visiting their father in the city of Garreg Mach, a series of strange events leads Byleth to befriend a mysterious girl named Sothis and a group of super-powered students calling themselves the Ashen Wolves. When tragedy strikes Byleth’s family, the six friends set out for revenge — along the way, they’ll uncover the truth behind the many mysteries that lurk in their city.

entry.title: Summary040
entry.summary: After being released from prison for stealing a loaf of bread, Ashe Duran finds life as an ex-convict difficult; however, following the generous act of Flayn, a holy woman, he sets out to become an honorable man and breaks parole. Five years later and under a different name, he has …
entry.content: After being released from prison for stealing a loaf of bread, Ashe Duran finds life as an ex-convict difficult; however, following the generous act of Flayn, a holy woman, he sets out to become an honorable man and breaks parole. Five years later and under a different name, he has made a living as a restaurateur alongside his trusted friend, Cyril, all while political tensions rise and his former parole officer Caspar rediscovers his trail. A Les Miserables inspired AU.

entry.title: Summary041
entry.summary: After losing many of his family and friends to a fire, Dimitri is afraid that he will forget their faces. One day, he and his uncle Rufus find an old camera and several albums filled to the seams with pictures that his father had taken over the years. Dimitri is …
entry.content: After losing many of his family and friends to a fire, Dimitri is afraid that he will forget their faces. One day, he and his uncle Rufus find an old camera and several albums filled to the seams with pictures that his father had taken over the years. Dimitri is inspired to take up photography and it changes his life for the better.

entry.title: Summary042
entry.content: After her father is murdered while investigating Arundel and his affairs, Byleth Eisner, an insurance investigator, is recruited by Claude von Riegan, a grifter, to lead a team of thieves. Through a series of cons, the Golden Deer work together to bring down Arundel's crooked empire.

entry.title: Summary044
entry.summary: Dimitri, Felix, Sylvain, and Ingrid have done a pretty good job of surviving the zombie apocalypse so far. Well, until some clever corpses manage to infiltrate their little safe haven. Now they're on the run again, forging back into the outside world, unaware of the threats they'll face and the …
entry.content: Dimitri, Felix, Sylvain, and Ingrid have done a pretty good job of surviving the zombie apocalypse so far. Well, until some clever corpses manage to infiltrate their little safe haven. Now they're on the run again, forging back into the outside world, unaware of the threats they'll face and the (familiar?) faces they'll encounter.

entry.title: Summary045
entry.summary: A small town high school AU for the Golden Deer house set in 1980, inspired by the TV show ‘Freaks and Geeks’, featuring all 8 students over the course of several chapters. Studded with classic tropes such as sports events, teenage rebellion, and the mysterious games of Dungeons and Dragons …
entry.content: A small town high school AU for the Golden Deer house set in 1980, inspired by the TV show ‘Freaks and Geeks’, featuring all 8 students over the course of several chapters. Studded with classic tropes such as sports events, teenage rebellion, and the mysterious games of Dungeons and Dragons. Meet the 'geeks'- Ignatz, Raphael, Lysithea, and Lorenz, and the 'freaks'- Claude, Marianne, Hilda, and Leonie, who all overcome their misconceptions of each other and realize that they have one thing in common- friendship!

entry.title: Summary046
entry.summary: A young prodigee and author by the name of Lysithea, who writes under the alias of J.J. Green, was given powers by an evil witch in return for several years of her life. Lysithea's undercover fame blossomed, but at a great cost. However, everything changes when she encounters a …
entry.content: A young prodigee and author by the name of Lysithea, who writes under the alias of J.J. Green, was given powers by an evil witch in return for several years of her life. Lysithea's undercover fame blossomed, but at a great cost. However, everything changes when she encounters a friendly vampire that promises to show her a better life.

entry.title: Summary047
entry.summary: After all the hard work that Mercedes has done, Dimitri decides to surprise her with a gift. That gift is access to a garden with a small house where he studied as a child. Despite such a lovely gift, however, Mercedes is still uneasy with all the happenings of war …
entry.content: After all the hard work that Mercedes has done, Dimitri decides to surprise her with a gift. That gift is access to a garden with a small house where he studied as a child. Despite such a lovely gift, however, Mercedes is still uneasy with all the happenings of war and the mysteries still surrounding Dimitri.

entry.title: Summary048
entry.summary: After her father dies, Byleth finds that he bequeathed her a piece of land on a distant island. She finds the house dilapidated and overrun with weeds, the people of the small town a mix of kind and suspicious of her. She goes to tie up loose ends, but ends …
entry.content: After her father dies, Byleth finds that he bequeathed her a piece of land on a distant island. She finds the house dilapidated and overrun with weeds, the people of the small town a mix of kind and suspicious of her. She goes to tie up loose ends, but ends up chasing out scorpions, wishing on stars, and discovering that American dollars did not exchange well for the island currency called Bells. Something about the place makes her want to stay a while.

entry.title: Summary049
entry.content: Couturier Hilda helps outfit politician Marianne for an important political event

entry.title: Summary050
entry.summary: When Byleth Eisner and her daughter, Lena Eisner, move into an apartment that’s been vacant for years, the neighbors are morbidly curious about their lives. Through a series of events, they learn a few things: 1) Byleth is a foster parent, 2) She has a wealth of advice and …
entry.content: When Byleth Eisner and her daughter, Lena Eisner, move into an apartment that’s been vacant for years, the neighbors are morbidly curious about their lives. Through a series of events, they learn a few things: 1) Byleth is a foster parent, 2) She has a wealth of advice and knowledge, and 3) there are more than a few wrinkles underneath the surface. Join the residents of the building as they learn more about their enigmatic neighbor and grow together.

entry.title: Summary051
entry.content: Ex "pro-gamer" Sylvain is bribed with fic to join Bernie's fledgling Askr Online team. They embark on a poggers journey of friendship, betrayal, rivalry and self-discovery.

entry.title: Summary052
entry.summary: Linhardt is a memory witch — he extracts people's memories and freezes them in Crest necklaces to be revisited whenever by those who needs it. He has no memories of his life, however, no sense of time or space but the present. Byleth stumbles into his store one day, and Linhardt …
entry.content: Linhardt is a memory witch — he extracts people's memories and freezes them in Crest necklaces to be revisited whenever by those who needs it. He has no memories of his life, however, no sense of time or space but the present. Byleth stumbles into his store one day, and Linhardt starts to remember.

entry.title: Summary053
entry.summary: Dimitri is down on his luck and out of options, so he makes a living by putting his ability to see the dead to work. He meets Felix, a detective, who opens up opportunities to investigate Cornelia, connect her to the death of his parents, and clear his family name …
entry.content: Dimitri is down on his luck and out of options, so he makes a living by putting his ability to see the dead to work. He meets Felix, a detective, who opens up opportunities to investigate Cornelia, connect her to the death of his parents, and clear his family name.

entry.title: Summary054
entry.summary: Claude von Riegan, Starfleet officer and captain of the starship "Derdriu", leads his crew on a mission to recover a relic sacred to the Nabatean people. What he doesn't expect is to be confronted by an Agarthan dreadnought or the rogue "Adrestia" in the Gronder star cluster. He's made a …
entry.content: Claude von Riegan, Starfleet officer and captain of the starship "Derdriu", leads his crew on a mission to recover a relic sacred to the Nabatean people. What he doesn't expect is to be confronted by an Agarthan dreadnought or the rogue "Adrestia" in the Gronder star cluster. He's made a name for himself as a brilliant strategist, but he'll need both wits and luck to get the "Derdriu" to safety.

entry.title: Summary055
entry.summary: Mercedes lives in the walls of a rural-ish house, she enjoys doing little things for the people who live there. Byleth moves in to recover from a heart condition. Byleth is inattentive, accident-prone, and oblivious to what is around her, and Mercedes finds that her hands are suddenly full with …
entry.content: Mercedes lives in the walls of a rural-ish house, she enjoys doing little things for the people who live there. Byleth moves in to recover from a heart condition. Byleth is inattentive, accident-prone, and oblivious to what is around her, and Mercedes finds that her hands are suddenly full with trying to keep her safe.

entry.title: Summary056
entry.summary: Claude, soon-to-be CEO of the Leicester Conglomerate, is also the elite underground hacker Khalid. In his explorations of the dark web, he discovers what seems to be a cabal of mysterious figures threatening the delicate cease-fire between Leicester and the powerful Adrestia Corporation. Pursuing this lead brings him to Edelgard's …
entry.content: Claude, soon-to-be CEO of the Leicester Conglomerate, is also the elite underground hacker Khalid. In his explorations of the dark web, he discovers what seems to be a cabal of mysterious figures threatening the delicate cease-fire between Leicester and the powerful Adrestia Corporation. Pursuing this lead brings him to Edelgard's doorstep and unearths another secret - the survival of Dimitri, supposedly killed when Blaiddyd Industries was destroyed.

entry.title: Summary057
entry.summary: The Blue Lions organization has been struggling due to past mismanagement, poor coaching, and a loss streak, but all of that changes when Dimitri and his friends finally enter the world of pro gaming via Overwatch and start to turn the tides. They've soon become fan favorites as an underdog …
entry.content: The Blue Lions organization has been struggling due to past mismanagement, poor coaching, and a loss streak, but all of that changes when Dimitri and his friends finally enter the world of pro gaming via Overwatch and start to turn the tides. They've soon become fan favorites as an underdog team with fun interactions, which means that in order to continue to promote the organization, streaming is practically a must. From their team apartments, follow the Blue Lions' shenanigans and interactions in-game as well! Familiar faces abound.

entry.title: Summary058
entry.summary: They say if you enter the Goddess Tower on a rainy midnight with a pocket mirror in hand, your soulmate will reveal themselves to you. But when Dimitri accompanies Felix and Annette to investigate the rumors, the three of them discover a mysterious world with strange monsters. When Dimitri realizes …
entry.content: They say if you enter the Goddess Tower on a rainy midnight with a pocket mirror in hand, your soulmate will reveal themselves to you. But when Dimitri accompanies Felix and Annette to investigate the rumors, the three of them discover a mysterious world with strange monsters. When Dimitri realizes this world could be the missing link he needed to find the culprit behind his family's murders, he and the other Blue Lions embark on a quest to reach out to the truth.

entry.title: Summary059
entry.content: Its opening night again - Ferdinand has lived it dozens of times now, though he hardly remembers it. All that’s truly there is deja vu and an impending sense of doom. Each time Ferdinand has chosen his duty over himself - will he choose himself this time?

entry.title: Summary060
entry.summary: Annette, Felix, and a handful of their closest friends set off on a voyage in search of The Red Canyon, a mystical isle said to be home to a clan of fabled warriors who might be able to help turn the tides in the war against the Adrestian Empire. Hardly …
entry.content: Annette, Felix, and a handful of their closest friends set off on a voyage in search of The Red Canyon, a mystical isle said to be home to a clan of fabled warriors who might be able to help turn the tides in the war against the Adrestian Empire. Hardly a week into their journey they are attacked by a mysterious ship and separated from their friends, only to fall into the hands of the Golden Deer Privateers. Now they must convince Claude and his crew to assist them on their quest, a quest that promises to be anything but smooth sailing.

entry.title: Summary061
entry.content: Marianne has just opened up her flower shop, but she's not selling a lot. After consulting with her friend Hilda, she receives assistance in the form of Lorenz, an acquaintance of hers. They worked together, and Marianne's business starts to bloom - as well as her relationship with Lorenz.

entry.title: Summary062
entry.summary: Felix is a high school student with a secret: he works part-time at a maid cafe. Since starting his job, he has had no problems keeping his schoolmates from finding out, but when transfer student Claude von Riegan shows up at the cafe one afternoon, Felix's secret is threatened. At …
entry.content: Felix is a high school student with a secret: he works part-time at a maid cafe. Since starting his job, he has had no problems keeping his schoolmates from finding out, but when transfer student Claude von Riegan shows up at the cafe one afternoon, Felix's secret is threatened. At first, Claude only seems interested in teasing Felix, but as they get to know each other, real feelings begin to develop.

entry.title: Summary063
entry.summary: Bernadetta’s passion for gardening pushes her to make an uncharacteristic decision, and when she is offered an opportunity to pursue her dreams, she takes it. When she moves into the flat above her future flower shop, she finds that she is not alone. Just next door, a girl named …
entry.content: Bernadetta’s passion for gardening pushes her to make an uncharacteristic decision, and when she is offered an opportunity to pursue her dreams, she takes it. When she moves into the flat above her future flower shop, she finds that she is not alone. Just next door, a girl named Petra offers a friendship and maybe something more too.

entry.title: Summary064
entry.summary: Dimitri and Ashe fatefully meet one summer, first on the boardwalk and then over a spilled Slushie and a mutual attraction. Together, the two of them try to overcome their hangups--Dimitri struggles with accepting and moving past the death of his father; Ashe believes fiercely in true love but is …
entry.content: Dimitri and Ashe fatefully meet one summer, first on the boardwalk and then over a spilled Slushie and a mutual attraction. Together, the two of them try to overcome their hangups--Dimitri struggles with accepting and moving past the death of his father; Ashe believes fiercely in true love but is unsure as to whether or not he deserves it--to achieve some kind of happiness. Others in their immediate group of friends also struggle with life changes and coming to terms with their own relationships and issues with the backdrop of the beach at summertime

entry.title: Summary065
entry.summary: Dr. Manuela Cassagranda, M.D. was a peerless surgeon at the start of a brilliant career with nowhere to go but up, her bright future star-studded and full of possibility for television deals, celebrity stardom, money, accolades, and suitors lined up around the block. She was going to rake in …
entry.content:
Dr. Manuela Cassagranda, M.D. was a peerless surgeon at the start of a brilliant career with nowhere to go but up, her bright future star-studded and full of possibility for television deals, celebrity stardom, money, accolades, and suitors lined up around the block. She was going to rake in the big bucks, marry some twenty-years-younger thembo, retire at fifty, and spend the rest of her life sunbathing on her deck while drunk on the finest mixed drinks money could buy.

Now she’s a live-in triage nurse at a kids summer camp, married to her college ex for tax benefits, old enough that she’s embarrassed to print her age on forms, and all she ever drinks is bottom-shelf boxed wine. And if all that weren’t enough, the twentysomething camp counsellors have decided she’s a “trans elder” and think she ought to tell her ex that she might still be in love with him.

At least it can’t get any worse.

entry.title: Summary066
entry.summary: In the hopes of promoting inter-house unity, a school-wide competition is held where representatives from each house get to go up against each other in a number of challenges. And while Felix has had hints regarding Dimitri's feelings towards him, the first challenge ends up more or less confirming his …
entry.content: In the hopes of promoting inter-house unity, a school-wide competition is held where representatives from each house get to go up against each other in a number of challenges. And while Felix has had hints regarding Dimitri's feelings towards him, the first challenge ends up more or less confirming his suspicions. Much as Felix purports to hate this revelation, he very much doesn't, and, as the event continues, he becomes increasingly attached, ultimately having to come to terms with the fact that he still has feelings for Dimitri, too.

entry.title: Summary067
entry.content: After completing his jail sentence, Jeritza goes back to living with his sister Mercedes, who owns a flower shop. At the same time, Byleth and Ignatz open a tattoo shop next to it.

entry.title: Summary068
entry.content:
Legend tells the story of the Siege of the Silver Maiden who raised the Lion's Banner and heralded the return of the king. 700 years later, Ferdinand von Aegir discovers a mysterious treasure horde while out riding.

A Jane Austen-esque historical fantasy.

entry.title: Summary069
entry.summary: An ancient secretive group seeks to bring forth their leader in a new body while the remnants of their last attempt mass forces to interfere with their plans. (In which Rhea is up to even worse tricks than usual, El is a failed vessel, and the Black Eagles (and friends …
entry.content: An ancient secretive group seeks to bring forth their leader in a new body while the remnants of their last attempt mass forces to interfere with their plans. (In which Rhea is up to even worse tricks than usual, El is a failed vessel, and the Black Eagles (and friends) attempt to interfere with a potentially world-ending ritual.)

entry.title: Summary070
entry.summary: Hubert is the longstanding head of security for the Hresvelg Group, a shadowy international corporate espionage outfit that's secretly funding political movements worldwide. While on assignment in the luxurious old-world nation of Faerghus, he encounters Sylvain, the bumbling womanizer he had a fling with back in college. Sparks fly, but …
entry.content: Hubert is the longstanding head of security for the Hresvelg Group, a shadowy international corporate espionage outfit that's secretly funding political movements worldwide. While on assignment in the luxurious old-world nation of Faerghus, he encounters Sylvain, the bumbling womanizer he had a fling with back in college. Sparks fly, but there's more to Sylvain than meets the eye... Is Hubert sleeping with the enemy?

entry.title: Summary071
entry.content: Cyril realises he is exploited by Rhea and sides with Edelgard to take her down. He recounts his past and the trauma he has endured, and along the way recruits Lysithea to Edelgard's cause. Climaxes with Cyril being the one to bring Rhea down in the end.

entry.title: Summary072
entry.summary: Dimitri and Claude were raised to be the finest magicians in all the lands. At the time of their 21st birthdays, they will have to face off against one another to see who had learned the most and the strongest magic. But until they meet on stage to face off …
entry.content: Dimitri and Claude were raised to be the finest magicians in all the lands. At the time of their 21st birthdays, they will have to face off against one another to see who had learned the most and the strongest magic. But until they meet on stage to face off, they run into each other off stage and slowly fall in love with one another.

entry.title: Summary073
entry.summary: Ashe is the newest and youngest cooking instructor the school has ever had, so he can't afford a scandal. So why can't he stop focusing on Byleth, who takes his instructions more seriously than anyone else, or another student whose demeanor stands out from the rest? Tensions rise as personalities …
entry.content: Ashe is the newest and youngest cooking instructor the school has ever had, so he can't afford a scandal. So why can't he stop focusing on Byleth, who takes his instructions more seriously than anyone else, or another student whose demeanor stands out from the rest? Tensions rise as personalities clash, and Ashe quickly finds that too many cooks in the kitchen can lead to too many complications in life.

entry.title: Summary074
entry.summary: Byleth is a bounty hunter in need of a new AI team for her spacecraft, but she is low on funds. Gains a cheap “Faerghus four AI” with many return tags on it. Dimitri, being the master AI, spends most of his time with the captain and quickly becomes enraptured …
entry.content: Byleth is a bounty hunter in need of a new AI team for her spacecraft, but she is low on funds. Gains a cheap “Faerghus four AI” with many return tags on it. Dimitri, being the master AI, spends most of his time with the captain and quickly becomes enraptured by her timid smiles.

entry.title: Summary075
entry.summary: The year is 21XX. Once the most highly advanced territory in Fódlan, Faerghus begins to fall following the death of the King and Queen, and the disappearance of the crown prince. After hearing a rumor that Dimitri had been spotted in the sanctuary known as Garreg Mach, Sylvain and Felix …
entry.content: The year is 21XX. Once the most highly advanced territory in Fódlan, Faerghus begins to fall following the death of the King and Queen, and the disappearance of the crown prince. After hearing a rumor that Dimitri had been spotted in the sanctuary known as Garreg Mach, Sylvain and Felix set out to look for him.

entry.title: Summary076
entry.content: Dimitri is a legal serial killer trying, earning the money to care for his sick daughter, while claiming back organs for GeneCo (A Repo! the genetic Opera AU). Struggling with guilt and the joy the jobs brings him.

entry.title: Summary077
entry.summary: Young explorers set out on an expedition to uncover ancient ruins of an alien society thought to be mere legend back on Earth. Little do they know, they may be closer to a living legend than they think. What this means for mankind, and it’s future has yet to …
entry.content: Young explorers set out on an expedition to uncover ancient ruins of an alien society thought to be mere legend back on Earth. Little do they know, they may be closer to a living legend than they think. What this means for mankind, and it’s future has yet to be uncovered, but when has that ever stopped Claude von Riegan?

entry.title: Summary078
entry.summary: Caspar can’t play an instrument to save his life, but his phenomenal singing voice makes him millions as the lead singer of a chart-topping pop-punk band. When a reclusive DJ (Linhardt) contacts him to collaborate, sparks fly and they end up making more than just a hit song. Caspar …
entry.content: Caspar can’t play an instrument to save his life, but his phenomenal singing voice makes him millions as the lead singer of a chart-topping pop-punk band. When a reclusive DJ (Linhardt) contacts him to collaborate, sparks fly and they end up making more than just a hit song. Caspar loves his rock star life and all the attention that comes with it, but the harder he falls for Linhardt, the more he wonders: can a tabloid king and a hermit ever be more than a one (or two or three) night stand?

entry.title: Summary079
entry.summary: After finally coming to the realization that he’s in love with his childhood friend, Sylvain struggles between wanting to take a risk, and not wanting to fuck this up. Felix, a freshman at Garreg Mach University, finally admits why he’s always jealous and angry at Sylvain’s flings …
entry.content: After finally coming to the realization that he’s in love with his childhood friend, Sylvain struggles between wanting to take a risk, and not wanting to fuck this up. Felix, a freshman at Garreg Mach University, finally admits why he’s always jealous and angry at Sylvain’s flings. During a Halloween party planned by the Ashen Wolves fraternity, Sylvain and Felix, with a little help from their friends, are finally able to have a long overdo conversation.

entry.title: Summary080
entry.summary: What if Rhea's experiments took centuries longer to create a vessel for Sothis? In a Victorian-era Fodlan, where crests have died out and magic is only a legend, Byleth Eisner is hired to teach swordsmanship to the students of the Officers' Academy. Garreg Mach is full of secrets, though, not …
entry.content: What if Rhea's experiments took centuries longer to create a vessel for Sothis? In a Victorian-era Fodlan, where crests have died out and magic is only a legend, Byleth Eisner is hired to teach swordsmanship to the students of the Officers' Academy. Garreg Mach is full of secrets, though, not least of which is a gruesome sword that looks like it's made of bones, and which lights up in her hands.

entry.title: Summary081
entry.summary: Edelgard and Bernadetta attend a private girl's boarding school, where Bernadetta is bullied and Edelgard attempts to use her social status to protect her. Bernadetta's social issues and undiagnosed autism cause her grades to tank and her father intervenes to take her to be homeschooled. Edelgard can't protect Bernadetta if …
entry.content: Edelgard and Bernadetta attend a private girl's boarding school, where Bernadetta is bullied and Edelgard attempts to use her social status to protect her. Bernadetta's social issues and undiagnosed autism cause her grades to tank and her father intervenes to take her to be homeschooled. Edelgard can't protect Bernadetta if she leaves so tries to stop her father, and accidentally kills him in a struggle, after which Bernadetta walks in on her hiding the evidence.

entry.title: Summary082
entry.summary: After Rodrigue’s sudden death and Glenn’s mysterious disappearance, Felix is saddled with the responsibility of operating the largest publishing house in Paris. Just as he’s starting to acclimate to his new role, his world is further rattled by the arrival of an American leather salesman / novelist-wannabe who …
entry.content: After Rodrigue’s sudden death and Glenn’s mysterious disappearance, Felix is saddled with the responsibility of operating the largest publishing house in Paris. Just as he’s starting to acclimate to his new role, his world is further rattled by the arrival of an American leather salesman / novelist-wannabe who’s come to seek out the joie de vivre in the City of Lights.

entry.title: Summary083
entry.summary: Ice dancer Sylvain Gautier - one half of Canada's Sweethearts(tm) Arnault/Gautier - is finally returning to practice after months out injured. He's really not expecting to see former skating prodigy Felix Fraldarius, who has been absent from competition for the last three years, warming up at his coach's rink. Where …
entry.content: Ice dancer Sylvain Gautier - one half of Canada's Sweethearts(tm) Arnault/Gautier - is finally returning to practice after months out injured. He's really not expecting to see former skating prodigy Felix Fraldarius, who has been absent from competition for the last three years, warming up at his coach's rink. Where has Felix been? Why is he back on the ice now? And how did he get so hot?

entry.title: Summary084
entry.summary: After being killed during Crimson Flower, Claude is met with a deity, who gives him the option to restart, which he takes, but he doesn't realize that every time he restarts, the world changes again, even if the dynamics between the three of them remain, and he must start from …
entry.content: After being killed during Crimson Flower, Claude is met with a deity, who gives him the option to restart, which he takes, but he doesn't realize that every time he restarts, the world changes again, even if the dynamics between the three of them remain, and he must start from ground zero. Every time he dies, he is met with the deity and the option to start again; originally, he wants to create a world in the verdant wind-ending image, but eventually realizes that he just wants to be happy and to find love with Dimitri. This is the story of the final life, from the first time he's back in Foldan, but he is born crestless and must ascend the throne of Almyra and do what he can from the outside.

category.term: CLAUDE NEVER GOES TO GARREG MACH

entry.title: Summary085
entry.content: Claude and Dimitri are at an impasse in their complicated relationship. They have one vacation down the shore to figure out if they are going to pursue a formal relationship.

entry.title: Summary086
entry.summary: Bernadetta, Ashe, and Ignatz have been working at their tattoo shop - and living together above it - for years now, in and out of each other's pockets and together pretty much all the time. But Dedue wants Ashe to move in with him, and Lorenz is about to make a big …
entry.content: Bernadetta, Ashe, and Ignatz have been working at their tattoo shop - and living together above it - for years now, in and out of each other's pockets and together pretty much all the time. But Dedue wants Ashe to move in with him, and Lorenz is about to make a big life change that's going to shake up Ignatz's life, and everything is going to change. And sure, the shop and her roommates have been the greatest source of stability in Bernadetta's life since she left home, and she's never been great with change, but she's handling everything FINE. Right?

entry.title: Summary087
entry.summary: Victorian & Jane Austen style romance. Lady Marianne is engaged to Prime Minister von Aegir by her father's will, and she resigns herself to a lonely life with a man she doesn’t know. Enter Duke Blaiddyd, a broken soul who has also sworn off romance despite the longing in his …
entry.content: Victorian & Jane Austen style romance. Lady Marianne is engaged to Prime Minister von Aegir by her father's will, and she resigns herself to a lonely life with a man she doesn’t know. Enter Duke Blaiddyd, a broken soul who has also sworn off romance despite the longing in his heart. Two starved dreamers fall into a forbidden love both passionate and restrained, entangled in a blasphemous web. Meanwhile, King Khalid and Queen Edelgard try to maneuver their own arranged marriage and the boundaries of trust, and Prime Minister von Aegir hides an opera-singing secret of his own. Fully illustrated with a painting for every chapter.

entry.title: Summary088
entry.content: After being framed with the murder of his uncle, the king regent, Prince Dimitri embarks on a mission with his fellow mercenaries, only to stumble upon a land he had thought to have been vanished.

entry.title: Summary089
entry.content: In an effort to raise the money he needs to replace his A/C unit, Sylvain gives his most loyal (and lucrative) fans the option of a private show. When “dab1162” takes him up on it, however, Sylvain isn’t prepared for the proposition that follows.

entry.title: Summary090
entry.summary: Dimitri and Felix are spies on opposite sides of a war; Sylvain is the unfortunate civilian who's been thrown into their mission with them. But there's a lot more to Dimitri and Felix's tumultuous relationship than meets the eye, and Sylvain is determined to get to the bottom of it …
entry.content: Dimitri and Felix are spies on opposite sides of a war; Sylvain is the unfortunate civilian who's been thrown into their mission with them. But there's a lot more to Dimitri and Felix's tumultuous relationship than meets the eye, and Sylvain is determined to get to the bottom of it before their recklessness wrecks them all.

entry.title: Summary091
entry.content: Take Cowboy Bebop and slam in the characters of FE3H. Space pirates kind of doing good but also kind of getting up to semi-illegal shenanigans. Space fights, drugs, sex, jazz music, moody and dimly lit bars - we're doing it all.

entry.title: Summary092
entry.summary: Marrying Felix is easy - it means neither have to come out to parents who aren’t willing, and there’s worse people their parents could’ve arranged for each other. Neither go in expecting anything, but when Sylvain catches feelings, “easy” quickly becomes something he’s got no clue how …
entry.content: Marrying Felix is easy - it means neither have to come out to parents who aren’t willing, and there’s worse people their parents could’ve arranged for each other. Neither go in expecting anything, but when Sylvain catches feelings, “easy” quickly becomes something he’s got no clue how to navigate. (or, Felix and Sylvain are the couple from that one viral Reddit post a while back about the marriage-of-convenience husbands ACTUALLY falling for one another)

entry.title: Summary093
entry.content: Six months after failing to sync with his jaeger and being dismissed from the Officer Academy in Enbarr, Ferdinand is sent to the wall in Sreng. There, he meets Sylvain. Or: the unmaking and making of drift compatibility.

entry.title: Summary094
entry.summary: After barely finishing his undergrad studying Cello performance, Felix is stuck in every aspect of his life: his career is going nowhere, he can't stand talking to his family, and he has maybe two friends. Crashing at Ingrid's apartment was all he had, until she suddenly decided to let world-traveling …
entry.content: After barely finishing his undergrad studying Cello performance, Felix is stuck in every aspect of his life: his career is going nowhere, he can't stand talking to his family, and he has maybe two friends. Crashing at Ingrid's apartment was all he had, until she suddenly decided to let world-traveling, friend-abandoning, breakout New York Times author of the year Sylvain Gautier crash with them, too. To make matters worse, she lied to her father and said Sylvain and Felix were dating so he wouldn't kick them out, which means that, now, Felix can't run away from his art, friends, family, Sylvain, or himself.

entry.title: Summary095
entry.content: Glenn and Felix commit one of the major taboos in alchemy by transmuting a human being. Years later, and they want their bodies back.

entry.title: Summary096
entry.summary: Ever since the attack that took her stepbrother from her, Edelgard and her friend Claude have taken up arms as werewolf hunters. One night while on the hunt, she stumbles across an injured girl in the woods and offers her help. The girl, Bernadetta, has nowhere to go, so Edelgard …
entry.content: Ever since the attack that took her stepbrother from her, Edelgard and her friend Claude have taken up arms as werewolf hunters. One night while on the hunt, she stumbles across an injured girl in the woods and offers her help. The girl, Bernadetta, has nowhere to go, so Edelgard allows her to stay at her place until she’s healed. Little does she know that the sweet, shy young woman she’s befriended is one of the creatures she’s bent on destroying.

entry.title: Summary097
entry.summary: Bernadetta's simply trying to get her next novel out on time when a break-in at her condo leaves her shaken up. As a bestselling YA author with as many enemies as fans, Bernadetta can't rely on just anyone to keep her safe. For Raphael, the best bodyguard in the business …
entry.content: Bernadetta's simply trying to get her next novel out on time when a break-in at her condo leaves her shaken up. As a bestselling YA author with as many enemies as fans, Bernadetta can't rely on just anyone to keep her safe. For Raphael, the best bodyguard in the business, protecting Bernadetta from the consequences of her own fame may be more than he bargained for.

entry.title: Summary098
entry.summary: Byleth is the disgraced commander of the Galactic Alliance of Humankind's Human Army, known galaxy wide for desserting the Human Army in a climactic battle against the Adrestian Empire. After killing Grand Empress Edelgard with his own hands, he lives quietly with his twin son and daughter as a jack-of-all-trades …
entry.content: Byleth is the disgraced commander of the Galactic Alliance of Humankind's Human Army, known galaxy wide for desserting the Human Army in a climactic battle against the Adrestian Empire. After killing Grand Empress Edelgard with his own hands, he lives quietly with his twin son and daughter as a jack-of-all-trades, master of none. His most loyal commanders under him, Dimitri and Claude, try to find their commander, but once they do, nothing is as it seems.

entry.title: Summary099
entry.content: Ingrid returns to the hometown she thought she'd left for good. While there, she runs into some old friends and her ex, Annette.

entry.title: Summary100
entry.summary: Fódlan is overrun with demonic beasts and it’s hard to tell friend from foe. Felix Fraldarius is an excellent hunter of the beasts, preferring to hunt them alone. When he meets Byleth Eisner – also an accomplished hunter – they both make snap judgements about each other and have to learn …
entry.content: Fódlan is overrun with demonic beasts and it’s hard to tell friend from foe. Felix Fraldarius is an excellent hunter of the beasts, preferring to hunt them alone. When he meets Byleth Eisner – also an accomplished hunter – they both make snap judgements about each other and have to learn to work together.

category.term: PRIDE AND PREJUDICE AND DEMONIC BEASTS

entry.title: Summary101
entry.summary: In a small town trapped between the shore and the woods, Annette is sent alongside Hapi and Marianne to find and capture a creature which lurks in the woods nearby. Her separation from the group leads to her being taken in by a kindly woods-dwelling woman she's not familiar with …
entry.content: In a small town trapped between the shore and the woods, Annette is sent alongside Hapi and Marianne to find and capture a creature which lurks in the woods nearby. Her separation from the group leads to her being taken in by a kindly woods-dwelling woman she's not familiar with, and who she finds herself both attracted to and suspicious of.

entry.title: Summary102
entry.summary: Five years ago, tensions between the three most influential crime houses in Fodlan came to a head and culminated in the largest turf war the city had ever seen. Now Byleth, a mercenary who’s sold their services to each of the houses at one time or another, emerges after …
entry.content: Five years ago, tensions between the three most influential crime houses in Fodlan came to a head and culminated in the largest turf war the city had ever seen. Now Byleth, a mercenary who’s sold their services to each of the houses at one time or another, emerges after years of silence as the head of the Church of Seiros, resurrecting an old, impotent house and flipping people who once belonged to the other houses. What are they after and can the other houses defeat them before Fodlan goes up in flames once more?

entry.title: Summary103
entry.content: Hilda is a popular influencer and meets pro-boxer/personal trainer Caspar at the gym. From getting to know him, she starts to have the confidence to start her own fashion business.

entry.title: Summary104
entry.summary: Felix never imagined he'd have to endure a university summer camp with a cabin roomie he utterly loathes. Sylvain is all about finding fun and friendship at the mountain getaway but he just can't get through to his sour-faced camp partner. Can they untangle the strange tension between them before …
entry.content: Felix never imagined he'd have to endure a university summer camp with a cabin roomie he utterly loathes. Sylvain is all about finding fun and friendship at the mountain getaway but he just can't get through to his sour-faced camp partner. Can they untangle the strange tension between them before it ruins camp for everyone?

entry.title: Summary105
entry.summary: A Western/Red Dead Redemption AU where each house is a gang in the Old West/Old West Fódlan. Dimitri was born into old money and a big business family but lost it all after the Tragedy of Duscur, becoming a gang leader with his childhood friends Felix, Ingrid and …
entry.content: A Western/Red Dead Redemption AU where each house is a gang in the Old West/Old West Fódlan. Dimitri was born into old money and a big business family but lost it all after the Tragedy of Duscur, becoming a gang leader with his childhood friends Felix, Ingrid and Sylvain. Many years later, he and his gang rob a train and he comes face to face with the new heiress of the Adrestian Company Empire, Edelgard von Hresvelg, his stepsister and the one he blames for his family's death.

entry.title: Summary106
entry.summary: To become king of Almyra, Claude needs to go through a ritual to stretch the bond between his daemon and himself, to prove to his people that he can endure anything and watch over the entire country. While on this ordeal, he reflects upon his past and what led him …
entry.content: To become king of Almyra, Claude needs to go through a ritual to stretch the bond between his daemon and himself, to prove to his people that he can endure anything and watch over the entire country. While on this ordeal, he reflects upon his past and what led him here, and those he loves and left behind in Fodlan. However, those left behind don't necessarily wish to be left behind, and Lorenz is there to catch him as he completes the ritual.
